name: Knight Bot MD
description: Advanced WhatsApp Multi-Device Bot with anti-call, group management, and extensible command system. Built on Baileys library.

SESSION_ID.description: KnightBot session string. Format: KnightBot!<base64_compressed_data> (obtained from session generator). Leave empty for QR scan on first run.

BOT_NAME.description: Display name of your bot (shown in status and logs).

OWNER_NAME.description: Name(s) of the bot owner(s). For multiple owners, separate with commas (e.g., John,Jane).

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Phone number(s) of owner(s) with country code (without + or spaces). For multiple, separate with commas. Used for owner-only commands.

AUTO_READ.description: Automatically mark messages as read in groups (true/false).

AUTO_BIO.description: Automatically update bot's profile status with BOT_NAME (true/false).

SESSION_NAME.description: Folder name to store authentication session data (default: session).

MAX_MESSAGE_AGE_MINUTES.description: Maximum age (in minutes) of messages to process. Older messages are ignored to prevent spam.

NODE_ENV.description: Environment mode (production or development). Affects logging level.
